update.description: v1.1 * Introduce of Environmental Analytic Module v1.0.12 * Progress bar during login and sync * Update of procedure & reason with adherence & count v1.0.9 * Fix of Ward/Facility adherence chart display issue which reported sometimes is not display * Added of user license agreement * Observer data collection summary * Monthly leader board * Audit report export in excel format * New filter analytics with 'By Reason' * Some minor UI/UX enhancement v1.0.8 * Feature with Custom Reporting, output to compatible MS Office Document (.doc, .ppt, .xls, .pdf) * MOH Report for Malaysia Country v1.0.7 * New Summary for Aseptic Procedure and Missed Reason
